actions.name: Coldflame

cost.trigger: The user applies either @Affliction[burn] or Frozen.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user applies either @Affliction[burn] or Frozen.
Effect: The user applies both @Affliction[burn] and Frozen for an equal number of activations.
